member this.RegisterServiceType : string * Type -> unit

param.name: serviceTypeName
param.para: The type name of the service type (as a string). This should match the type of the service group type as specified in the manifests and/or the CreateService command.

param.name: serviceTypeImplementation
param.para: The qualified service Type that implements the specified .

summary.para: Associates the specified with the actual managed Type that implements it.

remarks.para: Note that this mechanism for service type registration does not require a custom or to be provided at registration time. Service Fabric will generate one at runtime and utilize it automatically. If there is a need for a custom implementation of the factory, you can implement or and then provide those via the corresponding factory registration methods ( or )
